accountCode.description: Code extension definition without dimension information.

Description.description: Description of who manages this set of codes.

name.description: This may be a source authority/ owner name, ID or code.

uRL.description: Implementer: This is A URL to the code source authority/ owner.

id.description: Implementer: This is used for a database or key ID for the code item (if it is different from the @CodeExtension) in relationship to the obsolete code indicator.

checksAcceptedInd.description: Implementer: If true, checks are accepted.

encryptionKey.description: Note: This contains a key required to retrieve the full payment instrument details compliant with PCI DSS standards.

encryptionKeyMethod.description: Developer: This contains a reference to the key generation method being used - this is NOT the key value.

encryptionMethod.description: OpenTravel Best Practice: Encryption Method: When using the OpenTravel Encryption element, it is RECOMMENDED that all trading partners be informed of all encryption methods being used in advance of implementation to ensure message processing compatibility.

tokenProviderID.description: Developer: This contains a provider ID if multiple providers are used for secure information exchange.

authenticationMethod.description: Specifies the method that was used to authenticate the card.

Warning.description: Identifies an error that occurred in the processing of the payment card.

CustomerLoyalty.description: Program rewarding frequent use by accumulating credits for services provided by vendors.

id.description: A reference placeholder for this loyalty membership.

programID.description: Identifier to indicate the company owner of the loyalty program.

membershipID.description: Unique identifier of the member in the program (membership number, account number, etc.).

travelSector.description: Identifies the travel sector. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Travel Sector (TVS).

vendorCode.description: Indicate the partner(s)/vendor(s) for which the customer loyalty number is valid.

allianceLoyaltyLevelName.description: Name of the alliance loyalty level (e.g.,OneWorld  uses Emerald, Ruby, etc and SkyTeam uses Elite, etc.)

customerType.description: Original assessment of the customer by the travel agent.

customerValue.description: The supplier's ranking of the customer (e.g., VIP, numerical ranking).

password.description: The password for the member in the program.

loyalLevel.description: Indicates special privileges in program assigned to individual.

loyalLevelCode.description: Provides a numeric code assigned to a particular loyalty level.

singleVendorInd.description: Indicates if program is affiliated with a group of related offers accumulating credits.

SignupDate.description: Indicates when the member signed up for the loyalty program.

shareMarketInd.description: Permission for sharing data for marketing purposes.

shareSyncInd.description: Permission for sharing data for synchronization of information held by other travel service providers.

optInStatus.description: If present and set to opt out, a customer has explicitly opted out of marketing communication. When set to opt out it overrides the ShareMarketInd.

optInDate.description: The date and time of opt in.

optOutDate.description: The date and time of opt out.

codeContext.description: Identifies the source authority for the code.

expireDateExclusiveIndicatorInd.description: When true, indicates that the ExpireDate is the first day after the applicable period (e.g. when expire date is Oct 15  the last date of the period is Oct 14).

primaryLoyaltyIndicatorInd.description: When true, indicates this is the primary customer loyalty program and when false, indicates this is not the primary customer loyalty program.

directBill_ID.description: Identifier for the organization to be billed directly for travel services.

billingAccount.description: The account assigned by the subscriber for billing reconciliation of a corporate account.

PrivacyGroup.description: Allows for control of the sharing of direct bill data between parties.

Company.description: Company to which remittance should be sent.

costCenterID.description: A reference to identify the billing department for allocating cost of travel to company account.

paymentTransactionTypeCode.description: This is used to indicate either a charge, reserve (deposit) or refund.

guaranteeTypeCode.description: Used to specify the method of guarantee. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Payment Type (PMT).

guaranteeID.description: Provides the identifier as specified by the GuaranteeTypeCode (e.g., Corporate ID or IATA number).

remark.description: A remark associated with the payment form.

guaranteeIndicatorInd.description: When true, indicates this represents a guarantee rather than a payment form.

cashInd.description: Indicates that cash is being used as the form of payment.

redemptionQuantity.description: The quantity of loyalty units being redeemed.

PromotionCode.description: Used to provide a promotion code of the loyalty redemption and the list of vendors supporting the promotion (in CodeContext).

DirectBill.description: Company name and location for sending invoice for remittances for travel services.

Voucher.description: A form of payment using a voucher or coupon.

BillingAccountName.description: The name of the Billing Account for which the voucher has been issued.

Address.description: The address of the Billing Account for which the voucher has been issued.

ticketNumber.description: The ticket number of the miscellaneous charge order (MCO).

OriginalIssue.description: Provides information about the original document on which the reissue is based.

paperMCO_ExistInd.description: Indicates if a paper or electronic MCO exists.

ticketNumber.description: The ticket number which is exchanged.

reasonForReroute.description: Gives more information about the rerouting.

OriginalIssueAttributes.description: Provides information about the original document on which the reissue is based.

Rerouting.description: If present, indicates if the rerouting, which made the exchange necessary was voluntary or involuntary.

LoyalLevel.description: Indicates special privileges in program assigned to individual.

loyalLevel.description: Indicates special privileges in program assigned to individual.

loyalLevelCode.description: Provides a numeric code assigned to a particular loyalty level.

LoyaltyCertificate.description: Identifies the Loyalty Program, membership, form factor used by the certificate and its current status.

iD.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

iD_Context.description: Identifies the source of the code that identifies program or promotion within a loyalty scheme.

memberNumber.description: Unique identifier of the member in the program.

numberOfNights.description: The number of accommodation nights that are covered by this certificate.

format.description: Indicates what form the certificate is in e.g. Paper or Electronic.

status.description: Used to define the status of the certificate e.g. Available, Voided, Cancelled, Reserved, Used.

expireDateExclusiveInd.description: When true, indicates that the ExpireDate is the first day after the applicable period (e.g. when expire date is Oct 15  the last date of the period is Oct 14).

OriginalIssueAttributes.description: Provides information about the original document on which the reissue is based.

ticketNumber.description: The original ticket number in a series if reissuances.

issuePlace.description: Place where the original ticket was issued.

issueDate.description: Date when the original ticket was issued.

issueIATA.description: IATA office number, which issued original ticket.

paymentForm.description: Payment type for the original ticket.

checkInhibitor.description: When present, indicates that the check digit of the ticket number or the interline agreement do not need to be checked.

coupons.description: Gives a list of references to coupon numbers of the ticket which will be taken for payment.

PaymentCard.description: Specifies the details of the debit or credit card.

id.description: XML ID only for use within the document.

CardCode.description: Card code association such as VI for Visa, MC for Mastercard or AX for American Express, etc.

CardNumber.description: Credit card number embossed on the card.

secureInd.description: If true, all or a portion of this data is secure, via tokenization, encryption and/or masking.

PaymentCardDetail.description: Specifies the details of the debit or credit card.

companyCardReference.description: Note: This is a reference for a company sponsor for the card.

Person_Name.description: Description: The details of the Card Holder's Name.

SignatureOnFile.description: Note: This indicates if the signature is authorized as a form of guarantee. In some countries, the customer can sign the payment card slip as a form of guarantee.

ThreeDomainSecurity.description: Note: This contains 3-D Secure protocol information for online credit and debit card transactions for programs such as Verified by Visa, MasterCard SecureCode, J/Secure and SafeKey.

extendedPaymentInd.description: Implementer: If true, the credit card company is requested to delay the date on which the amount of this transaction is applied to the customer's account.

Enum_PaymentCardCode.description: The 2 digit code that identifies the credit card.

Enum_PaymentCardCode_Base.description: The 2 digit code that identifies the credit card.

PaymentCardType_Issuer.description: Code of the payment card issuer.

issuerCode.description: Code Extension fields to exchange a value that is not in the list and is known to your trading partners.

Description.description: Description of who manages this set of codes.

name.description: This may be a source authority/ owner name, ID or code.

uRL.description: Implementer: This is A URL to the code source authority/ owner.

id.description: Implementer: This is used for a database or key ID for the code item (if it is different from the @CodeExtension) in relationship to the obsolete code indicator.

Date_EffectiveExpire.description: Used to identify the effective date and/or expiration date.

signatureOnFileInd.description: When true, indicates a signature has been obtained.

taxID.description: The tax registration identifier e.g., Australian Business Number (ABN).

recipientAddress.description: Free text for the recipient's address.

eCI.description: Note: The ECI indicates the security level associated with an Internet purchase transaction.

TaxRegistrationDetails.description: Ticketing Goods and Services Tax (GST) details (typically the Australian market).

Voucher.description: A form of payment using a voucher or coupon.

seriesCode.description: Identification of a series of coupons or vouchers identified by serial number(s).

billingNumber.description: Reference of the billing account which handles the payment transaction.

supplierIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of the electronic voucher, created by the supplier.

identifier.description: Unique identifier of the electronic voucher.

valueType.description: Defines the type of voucher (e.g., full credit or partial credit).

url.description: Uri of the creating system. The URI should be an URL and be globally unique. Should only be omitted when the context is clearly implied for the containing document.

system.description: Name or identifier for the creating system.

company.description: Name of the company that manages the reference system.

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

groupDaysApplyInd.description: When true, specifies the Group Days Apply Value can be used for this Voucher Billing Account.  This indicator is used to allow the usage of a car rental days voucher when part of an inclusive tour.

electronicIndicatorInd.description: When true, indicates the voucher is electronic. An E-voucher is a value document issued by the Travel Agent for the customer. The e-voucher can be used as a proof of reservation, but more normally, as a full-payment or partial payment.

expireDateExclusiveInd.description: When true, indicates that the ExpireDate is the first day after the applicable period (e.g. when expire date is Oct 15  the last date of the period is Oct 14).

Coupon.description: Gives the coupon number of the ticket, which will be taken for payment.

Coupons.description: Gives the coupon numbers of the ticket, which will be taken for payment.

CustomerLoyaltyGroup_ShareMarketInd.description: If the value=Inherit, specifies data sharing permissions for marketing purposes.

Rerouting_Enum.description: Indicates if the rerouting, which made the exchange necessary was voluntary or involuntary.

SingleVendorInd.description: Indicates if program is affiliated with a group of related offers accumulating credits.

ConjunctionTicketNbr.description: Conjunction ticket number in case a conjunction ticket is exchanged.

coupons.description: Gives the coupon numbers of the ticket, which will be taken for payment.

Rerouting.description: Indicates if the rerouting, which made the exchange necessary was voluntary or involuntary.

reason.description: Gives more information about the rerouting.

CardAssociationCode.description:
A tiny string  
Minimum length of 0 and a maximum length of 32
